title: Clean frontend rebuild support for fresh deploy

requirements.summary: Add frontend-side clean rebuild tooling/docs to ensure builds run from a fresh state without stale artifacts.
acceptanceCriteria: A new deployment completes successfully without the prior failure state recurring due to stale build artifacts.
The deployed app loads and reaches the normal routing flow (login/onboarding/dashboard) without crashing.

file_operations.description: Create a reproducible frontend clean script that removes common local build artifacts/caches (e.g., dist output, tool caches under frontend/, and lock-step reinstall triggers) to support running the deployment from a fresh build state. Keep it focused on cleanup only (no new product features).

Add concise frontend-focused instructions for performing a clean rebuild as part of a redeploy (what to delete, when to reinstall dependencies, and how to validate the app reaches normal routing flow). Do not add new features; document only the clean rebuild/redeploy procedure.
